mapper.insert: insert into accounts (id, user_id, bank, account_number, balance) values (#{id}, #{user_id}, #{bank}, #{account_number}, #{balance})
mapper.update: update accounts set id=#{id}, user_id=#{user_id}, bank=#{bank}, account_number=#{account_number}, balance=#{balance} where id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into transactions (id, account_id, type, amount, balance, create_at) values (#{id}, #{account_id}, #{type}, #{type}, #{balance}, #{create_at})
